Detailed Description

Status statistics for a port.

Field Documentation

uint64_t cvmx_pip_port_status_t::bcast_l2_red_packets

Number of packets with L2 Broadcast DMAC that were dropped due to RED.

The HW will consider a packet to be an L2 broadcast packet when the 48-bit DMAC is all 1's. Only applies when the parse mode for the packets is SKIP-TO-L2

uint64_t cvmx_pip_port_status_t::bcast_l3_red_packets

Number of packets with L3 Broadcast Dest Address that were dropped due to RED.

The HW considers an IPv4 packet to be broadcast when all bits are set in the MSB of the destination address. IPv6 does not have the concept of a broadcast packets. Only applies when the parse mode for the packet is SKIP-TO-L2 and the packet is IP or the parse mode for the packet is SKIP-TO-IP

uint64_t cvmx_pip_port_status_t::broadcast_packets

Number of indentified L2 broadcast packets.

Does not include multicast packets. Only includes packets whose parse mode is SKIP_TO_L2

uint64_t cvmx_pip_port_status_t::dropped_octets

Inbound octets marked to be dropped by the IPD.

uint64_t cvmx_pip_port_status_t::dropped_packets

Inbound packets marked to be dropped by the IPD.

uint64_t cvmx_pip_port_status_t::fcs_align_err_packets

Number of packets with FCS or Align opcode errors.

uint64_t cvmx_pip_port_status_t::inb_errors

Number of packets with GMX/SPX/PCI errors received by PIP.

uint64_t cvmx_pip_port_status_t::inb_octets

Total number of octets from all packets received by PIP, including CRC.

uint64_t cvmx_pip_port_status_t::inb_packets

Number of packets without GMX/SPX/PCI errors received by PIP.

uint64_t cvmx_pip_port_status_t::len_1024_1518_packets

Number of 1024-1518B packets.

uint64_t cvmx_pip_port_status_t::len_128_255_packets

Number of 128-255B packets.

uint64_t cvmx_pip_port_status_t::len_1519_max_packets

Number of 1519-max packets.

uint64_t cvmx_pip_port_status_t::len_256_511_packets

Number of 256-511B packets.

uint64_t cvmx_pip_port_status_t::len_512_1023_packets

Number of 512-1023B packets.

uint64_t cvmx_pip_port_status_t::len_64_packets

Number of 64B packets.

uint64_t cvmx_pip_port_status_t::len_65_127_packets

Number of 65-127B packets.

uint64_t cvmx_pip_port_status_t::mcast_l2_red_packets

Number of packets with L2 Multicast DMAC that were dropped due to RED.

The HW will consider a packet to be an L2 multicast packet when the least-significant bit of the first byte of the DMAC is set and the packet is not an L2 broadcast packet. Only applies when the parse mode for the packets is SKIP-TO-L2

uint64_t cvmx_pip_port_status_t::mcast_l3_red_packets

Number of packets with L3 Multicast Dest Address that were dropped due to RED.

The HW considers an IPv4 packet to be multicast when the most-significant nibble of the 32-bit destination address is 0xE (i.e it is a class D address). The HW considers an IPv6 packet to be multicast when the most-significant byte of the 128-bit destination address is all 1's. Only applies when the parse mode for the packets is SKIP-TO-L2 and the packet is IP or the parse mode for the packet is SKIP-TO-IP

uint64_t cvmx_pip_port_status_t::multicast_packets

Number of indentified L2 multicast packets.

Does not include broadcast packets. Only includes packets whose parse mode is SKIP_TO_L2

uint64_t cvmx_pip_port_status_t::octets

Number of octets processed by PIP.

uint64_t cvmx_pip_port_status_t::oversize_crc_packets

Number of packets with length > max and FCS error.

uint64_t cvmx_pip_port_status_t::oversize_packets

Number of packets with length > max.

uint64_t cvmx_pip_port_status_t::packets

Number of packets processed by PIP.

uint64_t cvmx_pip_port_status_t::pci_raw_packets

RAW PCI Packets received by PIP per port.

uint64_t cvmx_pip_port_status_t::runt_crc_packets

Number of packets with length < min and FCS error.

uint64_t cvmx_pip_port_status_t::runt_packets

Number of packets with length < min.
